body_html: Yes in this field standards will be always behind state of the art. So a standard can evolve on research sediments. If we not start in some way we will leave only margin for near metal de facto (closed) standard like cudnn that in some way it is dictacting low level interfaces.

body: Yes in this field standards will be always behind state of the art. So a standard can evolve on research sediments. If we not start in some way we will leave only margin for near metal de facto (closed) standard like cudnn that in some way it is dictacting low level interfaces.
